Class Base

  • java.lang.Object
    • math.Value3D
      • math.Structure3D

  • public class Base
extends math.Structure3D
    Class that mathematically represents the base of a tank
    Version:
    May 5, 2018
    Author:
    Nikash Walia, Period: 2, Assignment: Tanks, Sources: None
